about_the_game:
• Enjoy a taste of The Other Side, a gripping 1-4 player cooperative ghost hunting experience that pushes the boundaries of fear and excitement. Developed using the latest graphics technology available in Unreal Engine 5, this game offers a visually stunning and immersive journey into the supernatural.

  • With Unreal Engine 5's cutting-edge capabilities, The Other Side delivers unparalleled realism, from the eerie glow of ghostly apparitions to the atmospheric details of haunted environments.





  • Team up with friends or brave the unknown alone as you venture into haunted locations teeming with restless spirits. Communication and teamwork are key as you work together to uncover the mysteries that lie on "The Other Side."

  • In-Game Voice Chat:
    Stay connected with your team using in-game voice chat. Communication is crucial as you share discoveries, coordinate movements, and react to unexpected paranormal encounters in real-time.

  • Combine Earned Equipment:
    Pool your resources and combine earned equipment to enhance your collective ghost-hunting capabilities. A successful job depends on the synergy of your customized gear, making every team member's contribution integral to unraveling the supernatural mysteries.





  • Vehicle Upgrades:
    Utilize the extensive progression system to unlock custom materials, a spectrum of colors, and specialized equipment to aid in your jobs. Personalize your vehicle to reflect your unique ghost-hunting style and ensure you're well-equipped to face the unknown on this chilling journey."



  • Character Customization:
    Purchase a new look for your character with a full range of apparel, hair, skin tone.



  • Equipment Progression:
    Test out the some of the equipment you'll use in the full game. Give yourself an edge and be the lead contributor to your crew's stash.

  • Headquarters Outfitting:
    Unleash your creativity as you get a limited, yet robust, feel for the home base progression. Move and place select furniture, sculpting its appearance to reflect your success in completing contracts and tasks.






  • Identify:
    Unravel the enigma surrounding each ghost by gathering clues and piecing together their stories. Use advanced ghost-hunting gadgets to detect anomalies and unveil the truth.

  • Cleanse:
    Confront malevolent spirits in intense paranormal encounters. Coordinate with your team to cleanse haunted areas, facing escalating challenges that demand quick thinking and courage. Use your Spectral Affixer to find the ghost's characteristics, and locate the bound items.





  • In this limited experience, you'll explore a seemingly normal residential house that has it's own dark history and unique challenges..



Are you ready to face what awaits on "The Other Side"? Gather your team, gear up, and step into the unknown. The spirits are waiting...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Embark on a chilling co-op adventure in this limited experience of The Other Side, an action packed horror experience. Customize your gear, strategize with friends, and uncover paranormal mysteries. Are you prepared to face the unknown together in this immersive supernatural experience?
